column17:
Show the world how fashion conscious you are with these stylish shoes from the house of Blanca. These red slip-ons will reflect your vibrant personality. Created with suede leather these shoes are extremely comfortable to wear.

Style Tip
Slip them on with a classic tee and denims for a stylish and casual look.

Specifications
Colour: Red
Usage: Casual
Style: Slip-ons
Material : Suede Leather

Care Tips
Gently brush them with a dry soft sponge or hand towel to remove dirt and restore surface.
Use the suede brush to scrub the stain as you would for a scuff.
